outbreakMakeHealthySprites:
Guna blok ini untuk mencipta jin raksasa sihat anda:
 <xml><block type="gamelab_makeNumSprites"><title name="ANIMATION_NAME">"healthy"</title><value name="NUM"><block type="math_number"><title name="NUM">10</title></block></value></block></xml>
outbreakMakeUnhealthySprite:
Sekarang cipta sekurang-kurangnya satu jin raksasa sakit dengan
 <xml><block type="gamelab_makeNumSprites"><title name="ANIMATION_NAME">"sick"</title><value name="NUM"><block type="math_number"><title name="NUM">1</title></block></value></block></xml>
outbreakSetSizeBlock:
Jin anda terlalu besar. Tetapkan saiz jin kepada 50 (atau kurang) dengan
 <xml><block type="gamelab_setProp"><title name="PROPERTY">"skala"</title><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_getAllSprites"/></value><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><title name="NUM">50</title></block></value></block></xml>.  Blok ini masuk *selepas* anda mencipta jin anda.
outbreakWander:
Jin anda perlu bergerak. Pastikan semua jin mula merayau dengan
 <xml><block type="gamelab_addBehaviorSimple" uservisible="false"><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_getAllSprites"></block></value><value name="BEHAVIOR"><block type="gamelab_behavior_get"><mutation></mutation><title name="VAR">merayau</title></block></value></block></xml>. Blok ini masuk *selepas* mencipta jin anda.
outbreakSubjectPointer:
Isi ruang kosong dalam blok 'tukar kostum' dengan blok subjek.
 <xml><block type="gamelab_checkTouching"><title name="CONDITION">"when"</title><value name="SPRITE1"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"sihat"</title></block></value><value name="SPRITE2"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"sakit"</title></block></value><next><block type="gamelab_setAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"sick"</title><value name="THIS"><block type="gamelab_subjectSpritePointer"></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
outbreakClickHealthy:
Tiada raksasa sihat yang memakai pelitup. Klik jin selepas menekan *"Jalan"* dan pastikan bahawa anda mempunyai kod yang betul:
 <xml><block type="gamelab_spriteClicked"><title name="CONDITION">"bila"</title><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"sihat"</title></block></value><next><block type="gamelab_setAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"topeng_sihat"</title><value name="THIS"><block type="gamelab_clickedSpritePointer"></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
outbreakClickSick:
Tiada raksasa sihat yang memakai pelitup. Klik jin selepas menekan *"Jalan"* dan pastikan bahawa anda mempunyai kod yang betul:
 <xml><block type="gamelab_spriteClicked"><title name="CONDITION">"bila"</title><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"sakit"</title></block></value><next><block type="gamelab_setAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"topeng_sakit"</title><value name="THIS"><block type="gamelab_clickedSpritePointer"></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
outbreakChangeSize: Cuba tetapkan semua jin anda dengan saiz berbeza.
outbreakNoneRecovering:
Pastikan anda menggunakan blok `jin mula pulih` *selepas* blok `cipta jin baru`:
 <xml><block type="gamelab_makeNumSprites"><title name="ANIMATION_NAME">"sakit"</title><value name="NUM"><block type="math_number"><title name="NUM">1</title></block></value><next><block type="gamelab_addBehaviorSimple"><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"sakit"</title></block></value><value name="BEHAVIOR"><block type="gamelab_behavior_get"><mutation></mutation><title name="VAR">pulih</title></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
outbreakOneRecovering:
Pastikan anda menggunakan blok `jin mula pulih` di bawah peristiwa `apabila menyentuh`:
 <xml><block type="gamelab_checkTouching"><title name="CONDITION">"apabila"</title><value name="SPRITE1"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"sihat"</title></block></value><value name="SPRITE2"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"sakit"</title></block></value><next><block type="gamelab_setAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"sick"</title><value name="THIS"><block type="gamelab_subjectSpritePointer"></block></value><next><block type="gamelab_addBehaviorSimple"><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_subjectSpritePointer"></block></value><value name="BEHAVIOR"><block type="gamelab_behavior_get"><mutation></mutation><title name="VAR">pulih</title></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
outbreakRecovering:
Pastikan anda menggunakan blok `jin mula pulih` di bawah blok peristiwa `apabila menyentuh` anda:
 <xml><block type="gamelab_addBehaviorSimple"> <value name="SPRITE"> <block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"> <title name="ANIMATION">"sakit"</title> </block> </value> <value name="BEHAVIOR"> <block type="gamelab_behavior_get"> <mutation></mutation> <title name="VAR">pulih</title> </block> </value> </block></xml>
outbreakCostumeTab: Klik tab `Kostum` di atas ruang bermain untuk menambahkan kostum jin baru kepada projek anda.
outbreakUseCostume: Kostum jin baru anda tidak dipaparkan dalam simulasi anda. Klik mentol jika anda perlukan petunjuk.
outbreakReplaySuccess: Pastikan simulasi dimainkan semula beberapa kali sebelum meneruskan!
outbreakSuccess: Anda telah selesaikan peringkat itu. Apabila anda bersedia untuk cabaran seterusnya, tekan Teruskan.
poemBotMakeBackground: Anda perlu menambah kesan latar belakang.
